Uses of Class
fr.applicationcore.error.APIException

  • Packages that use APIException 
    Package Description
    fr.applicationcore.junit.network
    Subpackage of 'applicationcore.junit' which contains the functions to interact with the testing servers by HTTP or HTTPS protocol
    fr.applicationcore.network
    Subpackage of 'applicationcore' which contains the functions to interact by HTTP or HTTPS protocol with the server using the ApplicationCore module for an application
    fr.applicationcore.toolbox
    Subpackage of 'applicationcore' which defines the toolbox containing useful functions
